name: Notly - Modern Notes App
description: A modern, fast, and secure notes application built with Next.js 15. Features a clean, distraction-free interface for capturing ideas, managing tasks, and staying organized.

name: Task Manager
description: A full-stack application for managing tasks with features like creating, updating, and tracking task progress.

name: Portfolio
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase projects, skills, and contact information. Designed with smooth animations, clean layout, and optimized for performance across all devices.

name: BatCave - Movie & Series Info
description: A responsive web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focused on showcasing Batman movies using a custom JSON data file. The app features detailed overviews, cast info, trailers, and a smooth UI for exploring the Batman universe.
